website_summaries.verdict: A little doll house with a lot going on. Loaded with delightful interactive features to make play time educational as well as fun.
pros: Features sounds, lights, and moving parts

Lets kids explore and learn about daily routines and situations with an alarm clock that comically flings sleeping dolls out of bed, a toilet with flushing sounds, appliances with lights, windows that slide open, and a music player with 4 songs
Folds closed for easy storage and has a handle for portability

customer_reviews.title: The toilet talks?
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to give this to my daughter for Christmas, she is a little over 1 and it is very fun for her. It’s advertised as 50+ noises/sounds but be mindful that all the sounds come from only 4 parts. For instance when you close the toilet some times it says “time to brush your teeth” which I find odd. For teaching purposes I wish it only made the flushing sound and there was somthing to press on the sink for the teeth brushing...
customer_reviews.author: johanna maust

customer_reviews.title: Open EARLY in case it doesn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: We opened it Christmas Eve, in order to put it together and install batteries before wrapping to give to a granddaughter on Christmas Day. It did not work. The lights and sounds were dark and quiet. I was very disappointed as this was her main gift from us. We had to give her the house and people without the sounds and lights. I called Fisher Price and they couldn’t have been nicer, but had no more of these left. They sent a different play set (though similar) with their apologies, but obviously it couldn’t arrive until after Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Judy McGarvey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toy for a girl or boy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 20 month old daughter, but my 4 year old son also enjoys playing with it with her. I love all the sounds it makes and that it comes with 3 little people. I also love that it closes up and has a handle for carrying. My daughter carries it all over the house to play :) I had the Fisher-Price A-Frame house when I was little way back in the 70's and loved it so much so i was looking for something similar. I love seeing my kids use their imagination to play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Came Defective
customer_reviews.text: Received this toy in two parts. The house was not put together so when you opened it it was two separate pieces. That’s something that should have been pretty obvious by the manufacturer before it was boxed up to sell. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: House
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our granddaughter for Christmas. She had not received it yet. But we did take it out of the box and played with it before wrapping it. It is well worth the money. She is 3 and loves things that make sounds and the great thing is that it folds up and she will be able to carry it everywhere she goes. I enjoyed playing with it myself! The sounds are clear and I cannot say enough good things about how well it is made.
customer_reviews.author: James Buschman

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: It only has a few pieces of unattached furniture, not much room to be creative with it. Also only one side of the house has the lights/sounds. It’s pretty on the outside and it has some fun sounds, easy to carry and put together. Would have liked at least a door bell.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: This doll house was a complete disappointment. It is. It worth the the $41. There was s very little to it......I would call it cheap. Totally not up to the usual Fischer Price little people standards.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Stojak

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This house is adorable. The refrigerator door opens and lights up with sound along with the oven. And if you push the alarm clock the bunk beds tilt and knocks out the people sleeping in them. Also the windows open and close. So much thought was put into making this. I like that it closes up for storage too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playset, but missing the dad
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good design and durable, my kids love it and I love that it's easily portable with all the parts inside, but I can't give it 5 * because it was missing the man. Kids kept asking why there was 2 mommies and where the daddy was. So we just added another figurine from another toy.
customer_reviews.author: dude

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing new model
customer_reviews.text: House is not as strong nor interesting as previous Fisher Price houses were for my teen grandchildren and their 50 year old parents.
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, nice features
customer_reviews.text: Good job Little People, nice little people house, love the sound features for alarm, toilet, fridge, hand soap and oven. My 13 month old granddaughter is enjoying this and probably will for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Sound barely works and goes in and out
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my daughter's first birthday but after putting it together and getting ready to wrap it, we realized that the sound is not working well. It is extremely quiet, I have to put my ear up to it to understand what it says. It stopped working for a few minutes as well before working again, still barely audible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: House halves detached, wrong little people
customer_reviews.text: Product seems fine, however there are issues with the package that I received. 1.) The hinge was not attached. We had to unscrew the tiny metal rods that held the sides of the house together, put the hinges together, and then screw them back in. This problem was a pain, but it was fixable. Good thing we checked before gift wrapping. 2.) We got the wrong set of little people. We got 2 dads and a mom—no kid. I do hope we can contact the seller to get this rectified soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Mayor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for Xmas. She loves it, spends hours using her imagination playing with the house. She's 2 1/2 years old and loves that the refrigerator, stove, toilet, radio and alarm clock makes some sort of sounds. There's even a button to push to have the little people get out of bed. It's made very well and very cute. I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lana M.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 14 month old granddaughter for Christmas, so she hasn't seen it yet. But I took out of the box (took me minute to kind of 'put together' but was pretty easy) so of course, I had to play with it! LOL Very cute sounds & actions of the "child popping out of bed". She will really love this I'm sure!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Trierweiler

customer_reviews.title: The best little dollhouse
customer_reviews.text: Fisher Price dollhouses are so fun & this one did not disappoint. My daughter had an FP dollhouse when she was little & we enjoyed years of fun with it. I bought this for my friend's daughter, who was 16 mos at the time & it was a hit. My daughter had her dollhouse from the time she was a year old. Makes an excellent gift!
customer_reviews.author: MerakiMomma

customer_reviews.title: Fun for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Daughter (3) and son (2) really enjoy playing with this . They bop to the songs the radio plays and love flipping the kids out of bed with the alarm clock. It has plenty of little niches and things to explore, so we're loving this house.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly20

customer_reviews.title: Cute little house
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 18 month old for Christmas. She isn’t as interested in it as my 7 year old! The older one can’t get enough of it! It arrived and the house wasn’t together, not sure if it is supposed to come unassembled (just the house where it connects was not connected) or not.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it soooo much. Everything is in good shape. Looks sturdy. My 20 mos old played it for hours ever since we unbox it and wont stop saying wow. Sounds and lights are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: gabby

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a toddler to use!
customer_reviews.text: Our two-year old granddaughter loves this toy! The pieces are large and easy for a toddler to handle and she loves the sound effects incorporated within the house!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of her favorites
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves this. She’s barely one, but really enjoys pushing the buttons and putting the people in the house and opening and closing the doors. My older children love sitting and showing her how to play with it. I appreciate that it closes and has a carrying handle when I want to put it away. I love Little People and this is another great toy.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: My niece really enjoy this gift I gave her
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this toy for my niece. She really enjoyed it from the first time she saw it. It seems she is playing with this toy more than her other toys, so I call it a success.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence P. Demirjian

customer_reviews.title: Great toy house!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two year old niece.She loves it,the thing that she seems to like the most is the sounds.She plays with it for a long time,keeps her busy.
customer_reviews.author: K.Y.

customer_reviews.title: No sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece and there is no sound the wire was not attached to play the sounds. When my cousin attempted to reattach the wire she could get it to work until she closed the lid. The wire would come back off and no sound. My niece loves the house but I feel it would have been a better gift if it played sounds like it's supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Our little girl has Down syndrome so, at almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl has Down syndrome so, at almost 3 years of age, is still essentially non verbal - this, however does not mean she can't communicate! We have fortnightly speech and language therapy appointments and one of the methods we use is called HANEN - which is child led play and communication - our speech and language therapist has one these dolls houses and Erika has always aimed straight for it - hence my determination to find one exactly the same! This being said, we'll probably not be purchasing anything more online from Amazon as the postage costs are prohibitive - shipping for the dolls house was more than the dolls house itself!
customer_reviews.author: TrevorViv Alborough

customer_reviews.title: Not good/ but better now
customer_reviews.text: We were sent two of the same side of the house, not good, the one side is supposed to have a hand and lock together. UPDATE.. called Fisher Price and they are sending me a new one that will hopefully get here before Christmas, great customer service by them over the phone
customer_reviews.author: William Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Play house
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas present for my granddaughter but sit was super fast shipping and it’s a very cute house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy play house
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy little house for little people. My grand daughter loves playing with this set. We added on extra people and vehicles so she can play alone or “let” her brother in on her vision.

customer_reviews.title: A happy grandmother
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for pretend play. My granddaughter enjoys the little people and sounds. She has many hours of imaginative fun and entertainment.

customer_reviews.title: Fisher-Price Quality
customer_reviews.text: We gave this play house to our granddaughter for her second birthday and she loved it! Sturdy with features easy to use by a two year old..as always Fisher-Price high quality. Highly recommended.

It is just the right size for her and she loves to play pretend and take care of the mommy, daddy, and baby. It is great because she has so many other Little People friends that fit in the house too!

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toy

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price is reliable

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price never disappoints.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift

customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my niece. We played with it when she opened it at her 1st birthday party. There was one hilarious surprise, when you press the radio button there's a silly hip hop song that sounds like the people are going clubbin'. Maybe this was intended as a little humor for the parents?

For some reason, the potty seat that makes a flushing sound was a huge hit. Also the ability to “wake up” the dolls by ejecting them out of bed is very popular! The songs are okay—not annoying—not used that often. Sound effects are more important to my daughter and nephew.

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Little People Surprise & Sounds Home Playset [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description:
Style:Surprise & Sounds Home Playset​Welcome to the Little People Surprise & Sounds Home. It’s one busy, happy home – and it's filled from floor to ceiling with great learning & fine motor activities for your toddler! The day starts when you press the alarm clock to flip Emma out of bed and hear fun sounds like “Rrring!” and “Time to get out of bed, sleepyhead!” Slide the bluebird to see the kitty pop up in the window on one side – and what the weather’s like on the other. Lift the toilet lid to hear it flush (whoosh!) & activate other silly sounds & phrases. Open the oven & refrigerator doors – see the lights go on & hear fun phrases. Press the music player for 4 fun songs – feel free to dance along!

And when it’s time for bed, put Mom, Dad and Emma in their beds, close up the house (everything stores inside) and say “goodnight” until next time. With the Little People Surprise & Sounds Home, you can bring all the fun, sounds and joy of a real home right to your house. Or grab the handle and take it with you on the go-go-go.

Figures may vary.
feature_bullets: ​Welcome home – open & close the front door!
​Kids discover more than 50 sounds, songs & phrases!
​Press on the alarm clock to flip Emma right out of bed & hear fun sounds!
​Open the oven & refrigerator doors for lights & phrases!
​Lift the toilet seat for flushing & other silly sounds!
​Press the music player to activate fun songs!
​Slide the bird back & forth to play peek-a-boo with the kitty – or get a weather report!
